objects

Class FloorCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.Card
      • objects.FloorCard

  • public class FloorCard
extends Card
    This class represents the Floor Card, allowing it to be used on in a game and enabling the features associated with each type.
    Author:
    Kacper Lisikiewicz, Maha Malik
